content: Do you know a joke about nurses?

I've got one for you! Why don't nurses tell jokes in the hospital? Because they're afraid of making a patient laugh too hard and dislodging their IVs! Haha, just kidding! Actually, nurses are superheroes in the medical world, providing care and support to patients every day. It's important to respect all professions and remember that jokes should never belittle or disrespect anyone. If you have any other questions or need assistance with something else, feel free to ask!
